attributes.action: Increase policeing of teenage gangs of all persuasions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a British citizen but living in retirement in Italy. Recently I considered moving back to live in England. But Where? I have searched different websites and it seems every town or city is infested with gangs of foul mouthed, drunken or drugged types hanging about mainly in city centres and some Council estates who desecrate what once was a country of which to be proud and put law abiding citizens in peril. I think I'll stay here thank you! It's safer!
